Come see for yourself what makes us different. Our Menu Our Story Here Every Day Is A Cause For Celebration Bay Street Biergarten is located at 549 East Bay Street on the Charleston Peninsula in the historic neighborhood of Wraggborough. Featuring beautiful high ceilings, large communal tables, and German-influenced, high-end bar fare, itâ€™s as close as you can get to an authentic Munich bier hall in the South. Read More Our Story Reviews Review By - Yelp Julia R: We just finished a delicious brunch! Forgot to take pictures. The chicken and waffles is to die for-chicken perfectly cooked and flavorful. I enjoyed the avocado toast with a poached egg added. It was perfect and just the right amount! I love going here especially for the big screens and sports watching! Review By - Yelp Ria B: The food was delicious, the pretzels tasted fresh and were my favorite there. The service was fast and efficient. The portions were big and the ambiance was perfect for beer, good food and football. Review By - Yelp Tori B: Ambiance is amazing! Great place to come and watch sports. Beautiful seating area outside too. They also have a great happy hour menu! Will definitely be coming back. Review By - Yelp Eileen G: Beautiful environment! There was live music at the outdoor area. The food was amazing and the service was so nice! I ordered Jagerschnitzel and it was super good! They also have some american options such as wings and salads! Review By - Yelp Maria M: Hands down my favorite restaurant that I have been to in Charleston. The service was amazing, and very kid friendly. The food was phenomenal. This is a place I would come back to time and time again.
